channel.title: How Do I Change Port Settings?
channel.description:
How do I change my port setting? I was looking at the Advertisements section, and saw that some people say "First of all, change your port setting to [Numbers here]" How do I??? I have tried the servers when other people have, and they have it working, and even people are saying " I tried it without changing the port and it didn't work" and well.. you get the idea ;)
[u]How Do I Change The Port Settings??[/u]

item.title: How Do I Change Port Settings?
item.dc:creator: @Fairafar Fairafar
item.description:
@Fairafar wrote:

Thanks… I’ll give it a try when i actually get Mopar WORKING again… It just crashed out on me

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change Port Settings?

item.title: How Do I Change Port Settings?
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

At the top left of Mopar (or whatever client you’re using) you should see a tab that says option, file, or something like that. I don’t have it installed anymore, so I’m not sure. There should be a drop-down menu that has I.P. Settings and others, you should see Port Number. Click on that and enter the port to change it.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change Port Settings?
